description: This file defines a React functional component named ConfirmDialog that renders a confirmation modal dialog with customizable title, description, and callback functions for cancel and confirm actions.

methods.name: ConfirmDialog
methods.description: React functional component rendering a confirmation modal with props for title, description, onCancel, and onConfirm.

ctags.name: ConfirmDialog
ctags.pattern: /^const ConfirmDialog = ({ title = 'Confirm', description = 'Are you sure?', onCancel, onConfirm }/
